meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: If you fall into a <vocabulary>pond</vocabulary>, what sound do you make? <reading>EEEEK</reading> (いけ)! Or maybe you're just afraid of ponds (I don't blame you, there are probably snakes or leeches or alligators in there) and you EEEEK when someone mentions them.
